description.p: Yaru-Colors is a theme project to bring different colors to Ubuntu's awesome Yaru theme.

release.description:
- New release specifically targeted for `ubuntu-21.10` - added support for `GTK4, GNOME-Shell 40,41` - Updated theme colors under [`what-if-21.10`](https://github.com/Jannomag/Yaru-Colors/tree/what-if-21.10) branch: - Yaru-Aqua - Yaru-Blue - Yaru-Green - Yaru-Lavender - Yaru-Pink - Yaru-Red - Yaru-Yellow
_Note: This release drops Yaru mixed colored-themes as it was dropped officially, so now Yaru-color-light is Yaru-color_
